about

Hello world, I'm a full-stack developer based out of Salt Lake City, Utah.

experience

My foundation is with the MERN stack, MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, and NodeJS. I'm currently participating in an internship in which I utilize my HTML, CSS, and Javascript skills. I've also learned a lot about PHP and WordPress development including handcrafting shortcodes for implementation of custom site functionality and Gutenberg/Elementor blocks.

projects

  • Make a meme or two, you could even post them to the public MongoDB powered database for others to see.

  • A weather app which displays your local weather upon loading and also offers the option to search any place in the world.

  • Users can create a profile, view their Spotify listening stats between 3 varying timeframe selections, post 1 recent playlist they've been enjoying as well as 1 piece of listening stats to be viewed by friends, and view listening stats plus playlists shared by friends.
    I consider this project ongoing, it has not been approved to be opened to the public by Spotify so feel free to poke around in the Spotify dev/test profile and interact with test profiles I created during development:
    Username: quinnton.carter@vschool.io
    Password: 73571ng4cc
    You can create an account with the dev account, boobootheclown and smashedfro are two accounts you can follow to test the friendship functionality and posted friend list's view.
